page.title: 11A day in school
page.content: When we go into school in the morning we have the registers called and we read for twenty minutes. Sometimes we have the Vicar of Wolvey or the{ARMY} Padre from Bramcote Barracks for assembly on Wednesdays. We have Maths lessons in the morning followed by subjects such as{SCIENCE,} French, Physical{EDUCATION}and Music. At 12 o'clock it is dinner time.I do not have a cooked school dinner and so I eat sandwiches which my Mum makes for me in the morning. We play in the playground after we have eaten until school lessons begin again at 1.15pm. Sometimes we have cooking and craft in the afternoons. On Wednesdays we have{ {GAMES}rounders and athletics in summer,hockey or netball in winter.Boys play football in winter and cricket in summer. At 3.30pm school ends and we go home.
